episodes.title: Speak Your Truth: Your Voice Matters | Liz Salazar & Crystal Welsh Sister Chats Podcast EP 3
episodes.description: In this episode, we’re diving deep into what it really means to speak your truth. From unlearning people-pleasing habits to embracing uncomfortable conversations, we talk about the beauty and bravery in being honest — with yourself and with the world around you.

episodes.title: Empty Nesting & Reparenting Our Inner Child | Ep 2 Part 2 | Sister Chats Liz Salazar & Crystal Welsh
episodes.description:
In this continuation of our Empty Nesting episode, we dive deeper into the  process of reparenting our inner child. 

This episode explores how we can become the caregivers we always needed, now, for ourselves. We talk about self-compassion, setting new boundaries, and creating rituals of nurturing and joy. 

It is an honor to be present!

#reparenting #emptynest #selfimprovement #parenthood

episodes.title: Empty Nesting: Embracing the Unexpected | Liz and Crystal Sister Chats Ep. 2 Part 1
episodes.description:
In this first episode of our two-part series, we dive into the emotional and practical challenges of empty nesting.  We explore the evolving dynamics between parents and their now-adult children—how roles shift, boundaries change, and what it means to support them without overstepping.

 Whether you’re in the middle of this transition or preparing for it, this conversation is all about finding balance, connection, and purpose in this next chapter.

Stay tuned for Part 2 where we dive into reparenting, reframing childhood trauma, and breaking generational patterns to become the best parents we can be for our children.

#EmptyNest #ParentingAdults #LifeTransitions #Reparenting #HealingGenerations #EmptyNestSyndrome #ParentingJourney #FamilyDynamics #PersonalGrowth  #BreakingCycles #EmotionalWellness

episodes.title: Beyond the Cult: Finding Ourselves & Moving Forward | Liz & Crystal Sister Chats Ep. 1
episodes.description:
Welcome to the first episode of Liz and Crystal Sister Chats! In this episode, sisters Liz and Crystal share their story, what led them to start this podcast, and their decision to leave the cult they were born into, with their children’s future in mind. But more importantly, this podcast is about what comes next: the healing journey, personal growth, and creating a new life.

If you’ve ever felt stuck in a controlling environment, faced challenges in rebuilding your life, or simply need a story of resilience and hope, you’re not alone. This is just the start of a new chapter.

Subscribe for more episodes on healing, growth, and life beyond the cult.
It is an honor to be present.

#LifeAfterACult  #HealingJourney #PersonalGrowth
#humantraffickingawareness #abusesurvivors #lifejourney #consciousness
